summary: ECO DIESEL ENGINE HAS BEEN SERVICED THREE TIMES FOR "ELECTRONIC THROTTLE CONTROL" FAILURE.  ONCE IDIOT LIGHT COMES ON TRUCK LOSES ALL POWER.  CURRENTLY IN DEALERSHIP TO BE SERVICED AND I'M BEING TOLD THAT CHRYSLER IS UNAWARE OF A CURRENT FIX.  THE FIRST TIME IN WAS TOLD THAT A HOSE HAD TO BE REPLACED. SECOND TIME THAT IT WAS A PROGRAMMING UPDATE, NOW THEY DON'T KNOW.
